mOnEnterOuterVolumeEvent.description: Event to post when OnGetClose is triggered

mOnExitOuterVolumeEvent.description: Event to post when OnGetFar is triggered

mOnEnterInnerVolumeEvent.description: Event to post when OnEnter is triggered

mOnExitInnerVolumeEvent.description: Event to post when OnExit is triggered

mIgnoreListenerRotation.description: If checked, then we don't rotate the audio source to match the rotation of the listener when inside the volume
